thread.title: Watch: Kings of Kebabs: Mangal 2 in East London
thread.title_full: Watch: Kings of Kebabs: Mangal 2 in East London

title: Watch: Kings of Kebabs: Mangal 2 in East London
text:
Hosted by Ferhat Dirik 04.11.2016 
Welcome to Kings of Kebabs , our brand new series about the dons of the British kebab scene. 
More than just purveyors of drunk food, the Middle Eastern, Mediterranean, and South Asian-style kebab shops that line British high streets reveal our late-night eating habits, and show how immigration can shape a city’s food scene. The combo of flame-grilled meat, bread, spices, and sauce also takes a lot of culinary skill to get right. After all, no one wants to be on the receiving end of a “dodgy kebab.” 
Our first episode takes us to Mangal 2 in East London. The Dalston kebab shop is as famous for its outspoken Twitter account and celebrity customers (Gilbert and George are regulars) as its authentic Turkish-style meats. Join us as we bow down to some serious kebab royalty.
